column4: hey all.  I was wondering how to vpn from my linux laptop into the network at work (windows)..
hey all.  I was wondering how to vpn from my linux laptop into the network at work (windows).... any thoughts?
Networkmanager already has a VPN menu. Did you try that?
You'll need to install the network-manager-pptp package before it'll work, though. You'd think it'd warn you.
